##evalFormula 

Evaluate list members that are formulae, using the map data as the environment (if provided, otherwise the formula environment)

### Description
Evaluate list members that are formulae, using the map data as the environment (if provided, otherwise
the formula environment)

### Usage
<pre><code>
evalFormula(list, data)
</code></pre>

### Arguments
* list with members as formulae
* data map data
